p: Fresh leaves (22.78 Kg) of Cinnamomum osmophoeum Kanehira ct. linalool were harvested from the Taimalee Research Center of Taiwan Forestry Research Institute, Taitung, Taiwan. The identification of C. osmophoeum was authenticated in the Silviculture Division, Taiwan Forestry Research Institute by Dr. Cheng-Kuen Ho. Leaves were hydrodistilled in the conventional apparatus in batches to obtain total 176 mL of leaf essential oil, and the yield of leaf oil was ca. 3%. Leaf oil was kept in dark glass bottles and stored in a refrigerator at 4 Â°C.
